name: Aadhaar
description: Aadhaar is the world's largest Digital Identity programme. Aadhaar provides presence-less foundational identity layer to India Stack. On top of this, various layers and user-cases get built

name: Unified Payment Interface
description: UPI is an open and interoperable digital payment platform that integrates multiple bank accounts into a single mobile application. It provides cash-less layer to India Stack

name: CO-WIN
description: CO-WIN is a transparent system that allows tracking of each dose of vaccine supplied to vaccination facilities and records the fulfilment of demand at a granular level.

name: DigiLocker
description: DigiLocker is a platform for issuance and verification of documents & certificates digitally

name: Aarogya Setu
description: World's leading contact tracing app to check and prevent covid outbreak, Aarogya Setu helps in predicting likelihood of spread of disease and possible hotspots. Digital health assessment provides updates on the userâ€™s current health status

name: DIKSHA
description: DIGITAL INFRASTRUCTURE FOR KNOWLEDGE SHARING (DIKSHA) offers engaging learning material, relevant to the prescribed school curriculum, to teachers, students, and parents.

name: UMANG
description: A single platform for all Indian Citizens to access pan India e-Gov services ranging from Central to Local Government bodies

name: eSanjeevani
description: eSanjeevani - National Telemedicine Service of India is a step towards digital health equity to achieve Universal Health Coverage (UHC). eSanjeevani facilitates quick and easy access to doctors and medical specialists from your smartphones.

name: Government eMarketplace (GeM)
description: An e-marketplace for public procurement of common use goods and services. It is end-to-end automated solution for government buying, right from order to fulfilment.

name: API Setu
description: An API platform to enable swift, transparent, safe, and reliable information sharing across applications and to promote innovation by linking systems and data.

name: E-Office
description: A complete digital work place solution for Government offices, E-Office Assists departments in informed and quicker decision making and less paper office.

name: E-Hospital
description: E-Hospital is a one-stop solution that connects patients, hospitals, and doctors on a single digital platform. It is based on based on the global healthcare standards like HL7, SNOMED-CT, ICD10 and LOINC, and Meta Data and Data Standards (MDDS) published by Government of India.

name: E-Courts
description: Transforming the Indian Judiciary by making use of ICT, E-Courts provides optimum automation of judicial and administrative processes. It is the backbone of Interoperable Criminal Justice System (ICJS).

name: Poshan Tracker
description: Poshan Tracker is an =important tool for women & child development and last mile delivery of nutritional services. It provides real-time monitoring and tracking of beneficiaries and duty bearers, and links with Education and Health Programmes for proactive service delivery.

name: National Non-Communicable Diseases (NCD) Platform
description: The NCD Platform enables examination, diagnosis, and management of non-communicable disease viz. hypertension, diabetes, oral, breast, and cervical cancers.
